alert.note: Alert for Fremont (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Local Area Emergency issued July 27 at 2:43PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Local Area Emergency... The following message is transmitted at the request of Wyoming Highway Patrol. Ashanti Alert on behalf of the Riverton Police Department for a Jane Jnudsen 05/13/1945. subject has dementia... requires glasses and oxygen which he does not have with him. Last seen at 0300 this morning in the Riverton area. Possibly driving a red jeep with possible plates of Wyoming 10 county 3 7 4 8 3. has knobby tires... spare tire on the back with a shovel... large winch on the front... and a white sticker on the front windshield. possibly headed to the Dubois area. If you have any information... please call the Riverton Police Department 307-856-4891 or the Wyoming Highway Patrol 307-777-4321
